reviews.review_msg: she is a nice person, who makes class fun, two assignments in her KPU class and two midterms. ONly one down fall is she does not mark your work on time. Our first assignment was marked last week of class. replies to emails slowly and takes for ev ver to mark. which was the most annoying part.
Best prof , she is amazing teacher as well as very humble person. She is easily accessible after class and understands her students. Extremely fair on marking assignments and mid terms
